title: HOSHINO Skipping Rope Kids, 280cm/9.2ft Adjustable Children Jump Rope with Wooden Handle, Medal for Motivation, Ideal as a Gift, Cotton, Wood
features: 【High-Quality and Safe Children's Jump Rope】: The wooden handle of the jump rope is made from beech wood. The smooth surface and the environmentally friendly, water-based paint are non-toxic and odorless. The handle has been extended to 12 cm/ 0.4feet, making it comfortable to hold and ideal for children. The carefully crafted rope is made from rubber bands and cotton. The attractive colors ensure that children have a lot of fun while playing and experience endless joy!

【Adjustable Jump Rope for Kids】: The jump rope can easily be adjusted to the desired length. Simply shorten one end of the rope, tie a knot to secure it, and you're done. This quick and hassle-free adjustment ensures that the rope is perfectly tailored to your needs. This way, you can make sure that the rope fits optimally while jumping, providing both comfort and efficiency.

【Fun for the Whole Family】: LeapBeast combines high-quality sports equipment for children with a thoughtful toy concept to promote motivation and learning progress. In addition to a specially designed jump rope for children, the set also includes medals as a special highlight. These medals motivate children to make quick progress, turning training into a fun experience for the whole family.

【Non-Slip and Wear-Resistant Design】: The ergonomic grip design provides comfort and easy handling. The unique anti-slip effect ensures a secure hold. The 15 cm/ 0.5feet long transparent rubber tube on the rope extends the protection area of the children's jump rope. The tube in the middle protects the rope from abrasion when it touches the ground, such as stone or concrete roads. This ensures effective abrasion protection and noise reduction.

【Ideal Gift】: The LeapBeast jump rope is the perfect gift for children! Thanks to its adjustable length, the rope is suitable for children aged 3 and older, as well as for older children. If you're looking for an ideal gift for birthdays, Christmas, or Easter, this wooden rope is an excellent choice. It offers great fun both indoors and outdoors, is suitable for many occasions, and will definitely be remembered for a long time!
